banner.name: Donavan Aziaka
banner.description: Front-End developer. I also build mobile applications.

about.title: About me
about.description: Donavan Aziaka is a Frontend Developer, with 2 years experience in web development, working at Desjardins. He graduated with a Bachelor Degree in Information Technology.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here is a list of projects I've worked on recently.

projects.title: Ugram
projects.description: Instagram clone made as part of web development Laval University course

projects.title: My Reads
projects.description: A web app that let you search for books and add them to your bookshelf

projects.title: Would You Rather
projects.description: A web application that enable you to choose between two choices. Made as part of Udacity course

projects.title: Socdist
projects.description: A project to explain the concept of social/physical distancing during the Coronavirus pandemic. Adapted from herdimm, a project to explain the concept of herd immunity
